attributes.action: Leave the current 17.5% VAT alone because we will just pay more in the end.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just leave the tinkering of VAT alone because it's not enough to encourage and increase spending but is enough to increase the big black hole already in the governments economy which will have to be paid back by us. We all know taxes are going to rise in the future, why make it worse?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
